amendment.description: An amendment numbered 11 printed in House Report 115-815 to require an annual report from the Director of National Intelligence describing Iranian expenditures on military and terrorist activities outside the country, such as on Hezbollah, Houthi rebels in Yemen, Hamas, and proxy forces in Iraq and Syria.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A011) offered by Mr. Lipinski.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Lipinski amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
